translations.chinese: 今吾於爵非輕也，吏獨安取此！
translations.english: Now I do not treat ranks lightly. How can officials arbitrarily take this!

translations.chinese: 且法以有功勞行田宅，今小吏未嘗從軍者多滿，而有功者顧不得，背公立私，守尉長吏教訓甚不善。
translations.english: Moreover, the law is that fields and homes are given based on merit and service. Now minor officials who have never served in the army have many who are satisfied, while those with merit instead do not get them. This abandons the public for private, and the commandery and county officials' teaching is very improper.

translations.chinese: 其令諸吏善遇高爵，稱吾 意。
translations.english: Command all officials to treat high ranks well, according with my intention.

translations.chinese: 且廉問，有不如吾詔者，以重論之。」
translations.english: Moreover, inquire strictly. Those who do not follow my edict, judge them severely."
The emperor held a banquet in Luoyang's southern palace.
